desc: kyth + kyn brings you Chinese herbal products rooted in Traditional Chinese Medicine and crafted for optimal health. Natural, pesticide-free, organic or premium quality, and made with a ton of love. Handcrafted for you by a Holistic Nutritionist and Traditional Chinese Medicine Doctor in Vancouver, Canada.

layout.text:
We are the modern Chinese wellness shop that you can trust. Our products are rooted in Traditional Chinese Medicinal food therapy and crafted for you and your family in mind.
It's our goal to bridge the gap between cultural and language barriers to bring everyone the amazing benefits of Chinese wellness products.
